p: The seven viral isolates were obtained from the nasopharyngeal swab samples, including three strains of H1N1 and four strains of H3N2. Antigenicity and sequence analysis of the three strains of H1N1 viruses confirmed that the isolated strain was S-O 2009 IV. And the isolate (A/swine/Shandong/07/2011) was used in aerosol infection models to verify its airborne transmission traits.
